title.narrative: 004 VIOLENCE, EXPLOITATION AND ABUSE

description.narrative: By 2015, 6 regions are able to provide comprehensive child-friendly interventions and services against violence including on HIV prevention, which contributes to Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2015, increased number of children who are registered, live in child-protecting families and communities and vulnerable children, including those in emergencies, benefit from gender sensitive and child friendly comprehensive interventions and services

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2015, 6 regions are able to provide comprehensive child-friendly interventions and services against violence including on HIVprevention

description.narrative: Comprehensive response service has been provided to survivors of violence through one stop centers and referral pathways at federal and regional levels. Adolescent girls and boys have also been reached with adolescent friendly HIV prevention services both at federal and region levels. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/06/2016
